goal.ch:
本課程為物理系學生學習實驗物理的連貫四學期之自趨探索式基礎入門課程，其目的為透過系統化的課程設計，探索實戰，進行身、心、道、術鍛鍊，建構從事實驗物理研究所需的基礎方法學、工程理論與技術、身心調控方法等基礎，得以承先啟後，探索創新，成為自由公民。
每周於課前預習、分組討論、設計實驗進度細節、撰寫預報，於課堂對各式實驗技術之背景原理，進行教師上課講授與學生報告討論，約二至三小時，其後配合在實驗室進行各式實驗系統建構與量測，課後進行分析、模型建構與實驗報告撰寫。 
實驗之細節項目、內容、進度均在教師與助教引導下由學生自訂之。透過系統模組化的課程進度設計，循序漸進培養學生掌握從事實驗物理研究所需之電子、數位、機械、電腦、數據處理分析、英文聽說讀寫、數學等研究工具。並進行如自主學習、深度文獻閱讀、系統思維與辯證、議題設定與執行、口頭與書面論述、團隊經營與合作、突破恐懼與自我超越等方法學鍛鍊，以掌握未來從事各式前沿基礎科學、高科技產業、或其他跨域探索研發與管理工作挑戰所需之鑰。歡迎認同理念，自律，想透過系統性方法學與技術鍛鍊，改變自己的同學參加。
goal.en: This is a four semester self-driving course for entry level undergraduate physics students. The course is aimed to train the basic experimental skills, altitude, and methodologies of experimental exploration for advanced physic and high-tech related R＆D fields. The basic skills include understanding and manipulation of tools such as basic analog and digital electronics, digital and interface control, digital signal processing and analysis, machine shop manipulation, mathematics, oral and written English presentations. The basic methodologies include self- and group-independent studies, literature search, systematic thinking and dialectics, issue setting and execution, oral and written presentations, team works and management, and overcoming fear and self-advance. In each week, each group has to complete self-study and related written reports of the issue to be discussed, and the plan and expected results of the experiment in the next class. In the weekly class, students have to present and discuss the background knowledge of the system and experiment to be conducted in the following lab work. After that, each group has to conduct the experiment in the lab, and analysis the results and complete the written experimental report after the lab hours. Each later experiment should integrate the prior experiments.

outline.ch:
第一學期專注於類比電子系統，透過含 RC, RLC, coupled oscillator, diode, transistor, operational amplifier，振盪器等基礎類比被動與主動電子元件與其所組合成的簡單至複雜系統，逐步進行基礎運作原理探討，電路設計與量測。利用上述系統模擬與了解力學系統中之各式振子(oscillators)之運作原理，各組並於下半學期設計與完成該組特有結合各式類比元件的創新類比電路系統裝置設計、建構、測試。每一學生於第一學期後寒假須完成一本英文小說之閱讀於下學期初進行十分鐘的英文口頭報告。
第二學期則以數位系統軟硬體鍛鍊為主，於第一學期後寒假展開行程式撰寫的自我學習，並於開學後系統化進行數位電子電路設計與量測、數位介面控制、類比-數位與數位-類比轉換、數位資料分析、電腦模擬、簡單機系工廠操作、3D 列印等鍛鍊。各組並以後六周完成該組特有的結合類比與數位系統軟硬體元件之完整創新系統之設計、建構、測試。並於期末本系舉辦的物理小年會參展。各式二輪自駕車、金屬探測器、電子樂器、數位寫字機、四軸直升機、語音分析器等均為過去數屆學生作品之例。第二學期末的暑假，各組學生設定對某一當代重要實驗系統或技術議題，進行深度文獻調查，與第三學期給予四十分鐘的口頭英語報告。
第二學期末指定數十當代物理實驗技術題目，要求學生於其中自選題目，於暑假期間進行深度文獻調查，於第三學期每組進行四十分鐘之英文口頭報告與討論。實驗部分則進行較深度機械工廠諸工具機如銑床、車床、鑽床、鋸床、3D 列印等操作鍛鍊。而後由學生設計各式外加驅動的複擺，結合前所學之類比與數位電子系統、程式控制與數值模擬，機械工具操作，進行複擺與量測系統的建構、量測、數據分析，數值模擬，並與理論預測與數值模擬結果相較，建構複擺的複雜非線性動力行為模型。
第三學期後半起至寒假，學生須進行下學期自行設計實驗專題的準備，在多項給予的大方向下擇一，完成如文獻調查、議題設定、系統設計、可行性評估等工作，於第四學期初進行實驗計畫的口頭報告。該實驗專題須為物理領域的創新研究議題，並於有限經費與十數周時間內完成初步成果。第四學期的課堂講授部分，則由每一或二學生由物理最佳期刊如 Physical Review Letter 或 Nature, Science 等選擇數篇有關該實驗專題相關的實驗論文進行口頭報告，期望學生透過報告不僅瞭解現代實驗技術如何系統整合，並瞭解近代物理研究的不同方向。期末每組就其實驗專題成果製作學術性壁報一份於物理小年會發表。
outline.en:
The first year class will be devoted to the learning, designing, and constructing of the analog (passive/active) electronics systems, including RC, RLC, coupled oscillator, diode, transistor, operational amplifier, SCR, mono- and multi-vibrators, Schimitt triggers, etc. In the second half of the semester, through integrating the knowledges of the above devices, each group has to complete the design, constructing, and testing of a novel analog electronic system.
Each student has to read an English novel, in the spring break after the first semester, and give an oral presentation in English at the beginning of the second semester.  In the spring break, each student also has to conduct the self-learning of computer programing with the minimum guidance from the teaching assistant.
The second semester will be devoted to the digital systems, such as digital hardware devices, AD/DA devices, digital control and data processing, numerical simulation. The entry level machine shop works will also be practiced. In the second half of this semester, each group should complete the design, constructing, and testing of a novel analog/digital electronic system, by integrating the knowledges about the analog and digital systems previously learned. Two-wheel self-driving robots, electronic music instruments, and self-driving coin searcher are the few examples of the systems designed by previous students.
The third semester will be devoted to leaning the mechanical design and machine shop manipulation, and constructing an integrated physical system for exploring the assigned experimental subject. In the class, each group should give a forty minute oral report in English about the modern physics experimental systems and techniques, which are thoroughly self-studied by each group in the summer break before the semester. Each team should also design and construct their own driven double pendulum system, the electronic and imaging measurement systems, the data analysis software, and the software of the numerical simulation; and give a final oral report about their findings.
Starting from the last few weeks of the third semester, each group has to start literature searches on modern physics topics published in the past five years on the prestige journals such as Nature, Science, Physical Review Letters, etc ; set a novel research topic, and design the experimental system for the special research topic to be conducted in the next semester. Followed by constructing the experimental system, data measurement and analysis in the forth semester, each group has to present a poster report in our mini-physics department annual meeting.
